item.title: I need a programming project idea
item.description: The most common question I read in every thread, and I imagine you already have too, is “I’m new at programming and I want to practice, can someone give me some project ideas?”. Usually people have a very long list of responses right under the sleeve, and the options range from programming challenges to traditional and easy to build programs like a pomodoro timer, or a reminder. There are even complete projects devoted to this situation, some of them very interesting (and I’ll list them at the end of this post), but I want to share a different approach.
